Glass Pool Fencing

Affordable, high quality frameless & semi-frameless glass pool fencing.

Get a Quote
Home / Products / Glass Pool Fencing

Superior quality material · quality customer service · satisfaction guaranteed

We use the best quality glass pool fencing and components at the most competitive prices.

With barely there lines, frameless and semi-frameless is the most elegant way to view your pool.

Frameless Glass Pool Fencing
Our frameless glass pool glass fencing provides a safe environment for children with an ultra-modern appearance.
Semi-frameless Glass Pool Fencing
Semi-frameless glass pool fencing is the most cost effective type of glass pool fencing. And it's quite stunning.

Consistency

All glass is processed from the same float glass supplier for consistency

Quality Control

All glass undergoes strict quality control checks to ensure an optimum product

Meticulous Care

Attention to detail in production and installation so you can be ensured of a consistent top quality product

Tinted Options

Tinted glass available to stand out from the crowd design

Quality that meets Australian Standards.

Australian Standards

Our commitment to quality and compliance means we supply carefully designed products, keeping in mind both the appearance and Australian standards requirements.

Modern Aesthetic

Our Stainless steel hardware’s complement our quality glass panels and are available in Chrome, and Matte black. They are superior in strength and have corrosion resistance for harsh marine environments.

Plastic Hardware

Plastic alternative options which don’t require earthing. 100% composite (plastic) construction means it will never rust or corrode. Made from ultra-robust, UV stabilised materials. Suits 12mm thick glass applications.

Make Cleaning a Breeze

Enduroshield's glass corrosion coating and protection stops corrosion by repelling water, dirt, oil, soaps and shampoo residues.

Glass with Enduroshield

With our glass corrosion coating and protection system, a shower screen or splashback will stay clear and bright requiring up to 90% less cleaning.

Glass without Enduroshield

Enduroshield's glass corrosion coating and protection stops corrosion by repelling water, dirt, oil, soaps and shampoo residues.
